content: a whimsical hat pattern that incorporates a double layered brim that will provide extra warmth around your ears on a crisp cold day the enchanted evening cap is a magical hat pattern that will become your favorite go-to pattern for gift giving or for yourself before entering this enchanted knitting adventure you should know the basics of stockinette stitch in the round picking up stitches and decreasing stitches if you have never made a double brim hat i include instructions on how to do so in the pattern for this charming hat pattern you will need at least 65 grams of dk weight yarn in the pattern pictures i used kimber s cozy creations tough dk in her self-striping colorway practical magic the finished unblocked hat measures 9 75 across at the widest point on the brim 10 stitches per 2 and 15 row per 2 thank you for your interest in the enchanted evening cap
